General.Name: ABRI SPAC I INC. Warrant
General.Description: Abri SPAC I, Inc. intends to effect a merger, share exchange, asset acquisition, share purchase, reorganization, or other similar business combination involving one or more businesses or assets. It focuses on identifying companies in the financial services industry. The company was incorporated in 2021 and is based in Beverly Hills, California.
General.Address: 9663 Santa Monica Boulevard, No. 1091, Beverly Hills, CA, United States, 90210
